belongs_to_collection.name: The Art of Anal Sex Collection

overview: TUSHY.com is back with the twelfth edition of its flagship series, The Art of Anal Sex! The award winning series continues it's singular focus on capturing authentic, passionate performances of real models who love anal sex. Cover model and industry legend, Lexi Belle, is an insatiable hedonist, coming back to L.A. to claim what's hers in her first and exclusive scene for Tushy. Rounding out the cast is Zoe Bloom, Harmony Wonder, and Carolina Sweets in performances that need to be seen to be believed. With beautiful cinematography, captivating stories, and stunning models in unforgettable performances--The Art of Anal Sex 12 is a collection that will leave you beyond satisfied.
title: The Art of Anal Sex 12
